page.title: 09WHAT'S HAPPENING IN MORETON
page.content:
{ { Extracts from Wirral News 2O.6.85} { News} Mr N. L. , aged 33, who lives at .... Lane, Moreton, was given a three year driving ban. He had drunk three times the alcohol limit and admitted the drink driving allegation. He was fined Â£25O.
An attic sale is to be held at Barnston Lane Scout Hall, Moreton on June 29th between l0.00a.m. and 4 p.m.
{Advertisements} Homes - Â£20,950. 3 bedroom semi. Lounge, Dining Room, Breakfast Room. Central Heating, Gardens front & rear.
Cars - l984 Ford Fiesta 950 Pop. Plus. Red, l owner, 9,000 miles. Cassette player. Â£3,595.
